Detailed Description

Struct with info on an exit or entry of a roundabout.

Parameters:
connection Pointer to turndesc struct repesenting this connection.
multiDig true if this connection i multidig.
exit True if this is a exit, false if it is an entry.
distance The distance in meters from the first conection of the roundabout.
angle The connecting angle from north.
index The rbt connections index in the roundabout. (Each index can have 0-1 entry and 0-1 exit.
